alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 6:45PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Johnson County through 715 PM MDT... At 644 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mayoworth, or 14 miles northwest of Kaycee, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Mayoworth around 655 PM MDT. This includes Interstate 25 between mile markers 257 and 260, and between mile markers 265 and 275. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Southeast Johnson County
